sqlMap.select:
select t.id, t.product_sort_id, t.parent_id, t.leaf, t.brand_code, t.product_code, t.product_name, t.product_unit, t.product_sort_code, t.product_brand, t.product_source, t.slave_file, t.memo, t.stock_price_date,t.amount,t.brand_code_history,t.tools_type_id,t.tools_type_name from t_product_tools_infor t where t.parent_id='root'
t.product_code like '%$productCode$%'
(t.brand_code like '%$brandCode$%' or t.brand_code_history like '%$brandCode$%')
t.product_name like '%$productName$%'
order by t.id desc limit #pageInfo.startIndex#, #pageInfo.pageSize#

select t.*,count(ta.id) as slave_file from ( select tt.id, tt.product_sort_id, tt.parent_id, tt.leaf, tt.brand_code, tt.product_code, tt.product_name, tt.product_unit, tt.product_sort_code, tt.product_brand, tt.product_source, tt.memo, tt.stock_price_date ,tt.amount,tt.brand_code_history,tt.tools_type_id,tt.tools_type_name from t_product_tools_infor tt where tt.parent_id='root'
tt.product_code like '%$productCode$%'
(tt.brand_code like '%$brandCode$%' or tt.brand_code_history like '%$brandCode$%')
tt.product_name like '%$productName$%'
tt.product_brand like '%$productBrand$%'
order by id desc limit #pageInfo.startIndex#, #pageInfo.pageSize# ) t left join t_accessories ta on t.id=ta.business_id
where ta.business_type in (1,4,5) or ta.business_id is null
group by t.id order by id desc

select t.id, t.product_sort_id, t.parent_id, t.leaf, t.brand_code, t.product_code, t.product_name, t.product_unit, t.product_sort_code, t.product_brand, t.product_source, t.slave_file, t.memo, t.stock_price_date,t.amount,t.brand_code_history,count(ta.id) as slave_file,t.tools_type_id,t.tools_type_name from t_product_tools_infor t left join t_accessories ta on t.id=ta.business_id where t.parent_id=#parentId# group by t.id

select t.* from t_product_tools_infor t where REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(t.brand_code,'-',''),' ',''),'_',''),',','') = #brandCode# and t.product_brand=#productBrand#
t.product_source = #productSource#

select i.id ,i.parent_id,i.sale_price, case when i.leaf = 1 then 'true' else 'false' end as leaf, i.product_sort_id,i.brand_code, i.product_code, i.product_name, i.product_unit, i.product_sort_code, i.product_brand, i.product_source, i.slave_file, i.memo, i.stock_price_date ,tt.history_price as stock_price,tt.edit_date as sale_price_date, tt.amount,tt.brand_code_history,i.tools_type_id,i.tools_type_name from t_product_tools_infor i left join ( select hh.* from ( select h.product_tools_infor_id,max(h.edit_date) edit_date2 from t_order_price_history h group by h.product_tools_infor_id ) aaa,t_order_price_history hh where aaa.product_tools_infor_id = hh.product_tools_infor_id and aaa.edit_date2 = hh.edit_date ) tt on i.id = tt.product_tools_infor_id where i.parent_id='root' limit #startIndex#, #pageSize#

select COUNT(ta.id) AS slave_file,ttt.rebate, ttt.id ,ttt.parent_id, CASE WHEN sph.history_price IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sph.history_price END sale_price, ttt.stock_price_date, case when ttt.leaf = 1 then 'true' else 'false' end as leaf, ttt.product_sort_id,ttt.brand_code, ttt.product_code, ttt.product_name, ttt.product_unit, ttt.product_sort_code, ttt.product_brand, ttt.product_source, ttt.memo, ttt.amount,ttt.brand_code_history,ttt.tools_type_id,ttt.tools_type_name from ( select ii.*, case when iii.rebate is null then 0 else iii.rebate end rebate from ( select * from t_product_tools_infor pti where pti.parent_id='root'
pti.product_code like '%$productCode$%'
(pti.brand_code like '%$brandCode$%' or pti.brand_code_history like '%$brandCode$%')
pti.product_name like '%$productName$%'
pti.product_brand like '%$productBrand$%'
order by pti.id desc limit #pageInfo.startIndex#, #pageInfo.pageSize# ) ii left join ( select re.id,re.product_sort_id,re.rebate from t_customers_infor cus,t_rebate re where re.customers_degree_id = cus.customer_degree_id and cus.id = #customerId# ) iii on ii.product_sort_id = iii.product_sort_id
)ttt
left join t_sales_price_history sph on ttt.id = sph.product_tool_infor_id and sph.sale_price_date=#salePriceDate#
LEFT JOIN t_product_brand pb ON ttt.product_brand = pb.name LEFT JOIN t_sales_price_history sph ON ttt.id = sph.product_tool_infor_id AND pb.sale_price_run_date=sph.sale_price_date
LEFT JOIN t_accessories ta ON ttt.id=ta.business_id GROUP BY ttt.id ORDER BY id desc

select ttt.rebate, ttt.id ,ttt.parent_id,ttt.sale_price, ttt.stock_price_date, case when ttt.leaf = 1 then 'true' else 'false' end as leaf, ttt.product_sort_id,ttt.brand_code, ttt.product_code, ttt.product_name, ttt.product_unit, ttt.product_sort_code, ttt.product_brand, ttt.product_source, ttt.slave_file, ttt.memo, ttt.amount,ttt.brand_code_history,ttt.tools_type_id,ttt.tools_type_name from ( select ii.*, case when iii.rebate is null then 0 else iii.rebate end rebate from t_product_tools_infor ii left join ( select re.id,re.product_sort_id,re.rebate from t_customers_infor cus,t_rebate re where re.customers_degree_id = cus.customer_degree_id and cus.id = '1' ) iii on ii.product_sort_id = iii.product_sort_id where ii.parent_id=#value# )ttt

select i.id ,i.parent_id,i.sale_price, case when i.leaf = 1 then 'true' else 'false' end as leaf, i.product_sort_id,i.brand_code, i.product_code, i.product_name, i.product_unit, i.product_sort_code, i.product_brand, i.product_source, i.slave_file, i.memo, i.stock_price_date ,tt.history_price as stock_price,tt.edit_date as sale_price_date, i.amount,i.brand_code_history,i.tools_type_id,i.tools_type_name from t_product_tools_infor i left join ( select hh.* from ( select h.product_tools_infor_id,max(h.edit_date) edit_date2 from t_order_price_history h group by h.product_tools_infor_id ) aaa,t_order_price_history hh where aaa.product_tools_infor_id = hh.product_tools_infor_id and aaa.edit_date2 = hh.edit_date ) tt on i.id = tt.product_tools_infor_id where i.id=#value#

select t.id, t.product_sort_id, t.parent_id, t.leaf, t.brand_code, t.product_code, t.product_name, t.product_unit, t.product_sort_code, t.product_brand, t.product_source, t.memo, t.stock_price_date,t.amount,t.brand_code_history,count(ta.id) as slave_file,t.tools_type_id,t.tools_type_name from t_product_tools_infor t left join t_accessories ta on t.id=ta.business_id where t.id = #value# group by t.id

select t.id, t.product_sort_id, t.parent_id, t.leaf, t.brand_code, t.product_code, t.product_name, t.product_unit, t.product_sort_code, t.product_brand, t.product_source, t.memo, t.stock_price_date,t.amount,t.brand_code_history,t.tools_type_id,t.tools_type_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_accessories ta,t_product_tools_infor t2 WHERE ta.business_id = t2.id AND t2.parent_id = 'root' AND t2.product_code = t.product_code) AS slave_file from t_product_tools_infor t left join t_accessories ta on t.id=ta.business_id where t.parent_id=#value# group by t.id
select count(*) from t_product_tools_infor where parent_id='root';

select count(*) from t_product_tools_infor where parent_id='root'
product_code like '%$productCode$%'
(brand_code like '%$brandCode$%' or brand_code_history like '%$brandCode$%')
product_name like '%$productName$%'
product_brand like '%$productBrand$%'

select case when count(*) = 0 then concat(#value#,'0000001') else concat(substr(t.id,1,length(t.id) - 7),LPAD(cast(max(substr(t.id,length(t.id) - 6)) + 1 as char),7,'0' )) end as id from t_product_tools_infor t where t.id like '$value$%' and t.id <> #value# and length(t.id) = length(#value#)+7
